H0.text: Which British king, famous for his string of mistresses,said "I do not believe God would damn a man for a little irregular pleasure" ? He made pleasure-seeking an art form, &was keenly interested in theatre and horse-racing, and was the first monarch to have his own yacht.". King Charles II

H1.text: Which British king, famous for his string of mistresses,said "I do not believe God would damn a man for a little irregular pleasure" ? He made pleasure-seeking an art form, &was keenly interested in theatre and horse-racing, and was the first monarch to have his own yacht.". King George IV
